channel.title: Please help
channel.description:
I'm a new coder, and I really need some help; this is what I did.
Port forwarded Setup Firewall Changed System Path + Classpath Setup No-IP And edited my compiler to my latest java version. Double-Click Run Server Run my webclient and I get Error connecting to server.
Please Help.
My MSN is "AnthonyDukaj@live.com"
Thanks
